name: GDLite
description: This mod turns Geometry dash into Geometry Dash Lite, purely cosmetic, doesn't actually restrict you from any Full Version features.

issues.info: Submit issues, bugs, or problems to me by opening a github issue to the GDLite repo, also please include crash logs if you have.

hide-lite-spr.name: Hide Lite Sprite
hide-lite-spr.description: Hides the Lite Sprite from MenuLayer

remove-more-games-menu-modification.name: Remove More Games Menu Modification
remove-more-games-menu-modification.description: Remove more games menu modification to prevent incompatibility

gdlite-wm-pos.name: GDLite Watermark Position
gdlite-wm-pos.description:
Ability to change the GDLite watermark position
 0 = no watermark at all
 1 = Bottom Left
 2 = Bottom Right
 3 = Top Left
 4 = Top Right

lite-spr-onloadinglayer.name: Lite sprite in LoadingLayer
lite-spr-onloadinglayer.description: Adds the Lite sprite in the LoadingLayer.
